MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 31-OCT-2020 23:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the DG6 postcode area of Kirkudbright and Twynholm. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.15AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive repairs required to a broken pole near Muirhead Farm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2.40PM on 31 October 2020.
